Class BTConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • BTConnector

  • public class BTConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods that allow to access a remote/slave NXT and gets its various motors and sensors. This way, they can be used in other methods with zero or minimal additional setup.
    Author:
    Antoine Tu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BTConnector()

      Gets the Clamp motor of the remote NXT.

      Gets the Forklift motor of the remote NXT.

      Gets the LightSensor on the remote NXT.

    • Method Detail

      • doRemoteConnection

        public boolean doRemoteConnection(java.lang.String name)
        Attempt to connect to a specified remote NXT.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the remote NXT
        Returns:
        returns successful connection state

      • getRemoteLightSensor

        public LightSensor getRemoteLightSensor()
        Gets the LightSensor on the remote NXT. This sensor can then be accessed the same way as if it was local to our master NXT.
        Returns:
        a LightSensor object

      • getRemoteForklift

        public RemoteMotor getRemoteForklift()
        Gets the Forklift motor of the remote NXT. This motor can then be controlled the same way as if it was local to our master NXT.
        Returns:
        a RemoteMotor object

      • getRemoteUltrasonicSensor

        public UltrasonicSensor getRemoteUltrasonicSensor()
        Gets the UltrasonicSensor on the remote NXT. This sensor can then be accessed the same way as if it was local to our master NXT.
        Returns:
        an UltrasonicSensor object

      • getRemoteClamp

        public RemoteMotor getRemoteClamp()
        Gets the Clamp motor of the remote NXT. This motor cna then be controlled the same way as if it was local to our master NXT.
        Returns:
        a RemoteMotor object
